item.source: This defence formula isn't right... right?

item.title: This defence formula isn't right... right?
item.dc:creator: @walkineagle walkineagle
item.description:
@walkineagle wrote:

Got this from a blank source whilst reading through ‘da c0dez’
at the top:

[code]

if (ItemName.startsWith("Bronze")) { return 1; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("Iron")) { return 1; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("Defence Cape")) { return 100; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("Steel")) { return 5;
Now, that means bronze + iron are the same defence, and the defence cape gives you extreme defence, right?

(this is where I got it from http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=394738.0)

Read full topic
item.source: This defence formula isn't right... right?
